means: 饶舌的人，轻浮，不负责任

sentence.Network_en: But I think you a horrid old – old flibbertigibbet.
sentence.Network_cn: 但我认为你是个可怕的老人,刷贫嘴的老头儿.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(52) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... fley 受恐吓 flibbertigibbet 饶舌的人 flic 警察.
F:flibbertigibbet n. 轻浮的女子共15个字母

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: probably imitative of idle chatter

auth_sentence.content: I'd always been the bright one, Victor the quiet one; I'd been the flibbertigibbet, he'd been the steady.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'd always been the bright one, Victor the quiet one; I'd been the flibbertigibbet, he'd been the steady.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'd always been the bright one, Victor the quiet one; I'd been the flibbertigibbet, he'd been the steady.

auth_sentence.content: This is the foul fiend Flibbertigibbet; he begins at curfew, and walks till the first cock.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is the foul fiend Flibbertigibbet; he begins at curfew, and walks till the first cock.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is the foul fiend Flibbertigibbet; he begins at curfew, and walks till the first cock.
